Summary: i was out with my dog he woke me up again,saw the light in the sky three bright ones
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Levittown

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was out in the yard with my dog it was 4.10am on july 8,2008 and i looked up in the sky and saw four lights this time, three that looked like two eyes and a nose bright head lights and a little father away but it was part of the object a pink color light at the front of the object. and i saw like a blue fog out which i will call the back of the object, it looked like it was shinning lights around i watched for over 40min just moved slowly through the sky not leaving it space to much. i thought i saw silver flakes falling down into the tree tops and after a while the flakes went back up to the object. i thought it was lighten bugs or fireflys. but it went back up.near the craft. it was still up there when i went to bed, i tried to take pictures again they look to black .it made no noice,moes quickly small areas,i get a little nervous being out there to long.this is the forth time i have seen ufos in the levittown area since april\it was very overcast so i couldn't get a good look at the sides of the object,every once in a while a quick glimpse. color sides
